description:
This is the fifth part of an introductory  business information systems series, designed to help you pass the CLEP Information Systems and Computer Applications exam and introduce you to the amazing world of Information Technology.

In this course, you will learn the basic concepts of information systems and their application.
title: ISC101.5x: CLEP Information Systems and Computer Applications, Part 5: Social Implications
instructors: Ignacio Despujol, Carlos Turró, Miguel Rebollo and Vicent Botti Navarro
